title: Using language models to integrate clinical decision support and note taking: a qualitative study
details: A Adibi, RTL Ruan, X Yin, Y Ding, KE Maclean - 2024
abstract: Introduction: Prior to designing a novel user interface which would integrate clinical decision support from the Acute COPD Exacerbation Prediction Tool (ACCEPT) with physician note-taking, we conducted an exploratory qualitative study to understand …
